text: Arthur Emanuel Christensen (9 January 1875 – 31 March 1945) was a Danish orientalist and scholar of Iranian philology and folklore. He is best known for his works on the Iranian history, mythology, religions and medicine. Christensen received his doctorate in 1903. == References == Category:People from Copenhagen Category:Danish writers Category:Iranologists Category:1875 births Category:1945 deaths
title: Arthur Christensen
